text: Matti Juhani Puhakka (7 February 1945 – 6 October 2021) was a Finnish politician. He was a member of the Social Democrats. Pukakka was born in Eno, Finland. He was Finland's Minister of Transport from 1983 until 1984 and Minister of Social Affairs and Health from 1984 until 1987. He was the Minister of Labor from 1987 until 1991. He was elected to the Finnish Parliament two times: 1975-1991 and 1995–1996. He died on 6 October 2021, at the age of 76.Ministeri Matti Puhakka on kuollut ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Finnish politicians
title: Matti Puhakka
